= Your LCD has died =

Until recently the replacement LCD has been the achillies heal of the 9x.  The most common part to fail, and near no chance of a replacement without buying a new radio!

Good news is that by working with the supply chain, we have arranged for a Chinese supplier to stock the LCD as a spare.

They can be purchased from:

<a href="http://www.r2hobbies.com/eng/proddetail.php?prod=rcps2845001&PARTNER=robthomson">www.r2hobbies.com</a>

Note! The R2 site lists these as being for the Eurgle Radio.  The Eurgle Radio is simply a rebranded 9X, so it will work in any of the 9X based radios!
